operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO photo_datas (photo_id, photo_type, dc_id, volume_id, local_id, access_hash, width, height, bytes) VALUES (:photo_id, :photo_type, :dc_id, :volume_id, :local_id, :access_hash, :width, :height, :bytes)

operation.name: SelectByFileLocation
operation.sql: SELECT id, photo_id, photo_type, bytes FROM photo_datas WHERE dc_id = 2 AND volume_id = :volume_id AND local_id = :local_id AND access_hash = :access_hash
